turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about PlaceSpeak.
turn.2: Geo-verified users can respond to surveys, polls, discussion forums and participatory maps, providing insight into how residents in a specific area feel about a particular issue.
turn.3: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.4: PlaceSpeak is a cloud-based public participation platform that generates Geo-spatial feedback data, closely related to a form of Volunteered Geographic Information (VGI).
turn.6: It is an e-consultation toolkit that allows proponents to connect with and geo-authenticate citizen users based on their location.
turn.8: It uses a 3-step digital identification process to authenticate a user’s residential address.
turn.10: PlaceSpeak is based on a web application framework which enables GIS scaling and has a built in archiving structure.
turn.11: Can you connect it to social media?
turn.12: It has an Application Programming Interface that enables integration with third party applications, such as Facebook and Twitter.
